Characters and enemies have different resistances to [[Physical]]. Character resistance can be increased or enemy resistances decreased by talents, constellations, or artifacts.

==Increasing Character Resistance==
===Elemental Resonance===
{{Main|Elemental Resonance}}
When in a party of 4 different elements, the Elemental Resonance [[Protective Canopy]] increases All Elemental RES and Physical RES by 15%.

The following talents increase a character's Physical RES.

==Decreasing Enemy Resistance==
===Reactions===
The [[Elemental Reaction]] {{Element|Electro|24}} {{Element|Cryo|24}} [[Superconduct]] decreases an enemy's Physical RES by 40% for 12 seconds.
